item.title: Installation of Docker and Portainer
item.description: In this post I will show how to install docker and portainer in a linux distro.

item.title: Github Token
item.description: This is a tutorial how to create personal access token from github and configure your github client to use it. This will be done in 2 steps: Create a access token. Add the token to your git client. Step 1 [Creating github token]: Go to your github account settings. Go to Developer Setting at the bottom. Go to Personal Access token and create a Tokens(classic) Fill the information and copy the token The token will be like this ghp_JCEAUrOjKjdicbjshrv50Dasdfkv Step 2 [Adding the token to your client] For Windows: Go to Credential Manager from Control Panel > Windows Credentials > find git:https://github.
